sentences.sContent: Fighting broke out in the crowds.
More units to fight forest fires are planned.
sentences.sCn: 已经计划增派部队来扑灭森林大火。

sentences.sContent: I've spent a lifetime fighting against racism and prejudice.
sentences.sCn: 我花了毕生的时间与种族歧视和偏见作斗争。

synos.tran: 战斗的；好战的；适于格斗的
奋斗（fight的ing形式）；打仗；与…进行拳击

phrases.pCn: 经过努力奋斗才能获得成功的机会

words.tran: 战士，斗争者；斗士；奋斗者；好战者
打架；与…打仗，与…斗争；反对…提案；n. 打架；战斗，斗志

trans.tranCn: 战斗的；好战的；适于格斗的

trans.tranOther: when people or groups fight each other in a war, in the street etc

trans.tranCn: 奋斗（fight的ing形式）；打仗；与…进行拳击
trans.tranOther: If you fight something unpleasant, you try in a determined way to prevent it or stop it from happening
